MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 and L39 postcode areas of Liverpool and Ormskirk, affecting properties in Melling, Aughton and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:35PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09PM on 27th April 2021.
